sn36.6:1.1: “Assutavā, bhikkhave, puthujjano sukhampi vedanaṁ vedayati, dukkhampi vedanaṁ vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi vedanaṁ vedayati.
sn36.6:1.2: Sutavā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sukhampi vedanaṁ vedayati, dukkhampi vedanaṁ vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi vedanaṁ vedayati.
sn36.6:1.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, ko viseso ko adhippayāso kiṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanenā”ti?
sn36.6:1.5: assutavā, bhikkhave, puthujjano dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṁ kandati sammohaṁ āpajjati.
sn36.6:1.10: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, puriso dvisallena vedanaṁ vedayati.
sn36.6:1.11: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṁ kandati sammohaṁ āpajjati.
sn36.6:1.14: Tassāyeva kho pana dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno paṭighavā hoti.
sn36.6:1.15: Tamenaṁ dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighavantaṁ, yo dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo, so anuseti.
sn36.6:1.16: So dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno kāmasukhaṁ abhinandati.
sn36.6:1.18: Na hi so, bhikkhave, pajānāti assutavā puthujjano aññatra kāmasukhā dukkhāya vedanāya nissaraṇaṁ,
sn36.6:1.19: tassa kāmasukhañca abhinandato, yo sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo, so anuseti.
sn36.6:1.20: So tāsaṁ vedanānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn36.6:1.21: Tassa tāsaṁ vedanānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ appajānato, yo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya avijjānusayo, so anuseti.
sn36.6:1.22: So sukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, saññutto naṁ vedayati.
sn36.6:1.23: Dukkhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, saññutto naṁ vedayati.
sn36.6:1.24: Adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, saññutto naṁ vedayati.
sn36.6:1.25: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘assutavā puthujjano saññutto jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, saññutto dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
sn36.6:2.1: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno na socati, na kilamati, na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
sn36.6:3.2: Tamenaṁ dutiyena sallena anuvedhaṁ na vijjheyya.
sn36.6:3.3: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, puriso ekasallena vedanaṁ vedayati.
sn36.6:3.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno na socati, na kilamati, na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
sn36.6:3.7: Tassāyeva kho pana dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno paṭighavā na hoti.
sn36.6:3.8: Tamenaṁ dukkhāya vedanāya appaṭighavantaṁ, yo dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo, so nānuseti.
sn36.6:3.9: So dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno kāmasukhaṁ nābhinandati.
sn36.6:3.11: Pajānāti hi so, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako aññatra kāmasukhā dukkhāya vedanāya nissaraṇaṁ.
sn36.6:3.12: Tassa kāmasukhaṁ nābhinandato yo sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo, so nānuseti.
sn36.6:3.13: So tāsaṁ vedanānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavaṁ ca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn36.6:3.14: Tassa tāsaṁ vedanānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānato, yo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya avijjānusayo, so nānuseti.
sn36.6:3.15: So sukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, visaññutto naṁ vedayati.
sn36.6:3.16: Dukkhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, visaññutto naṁ vedayati.
sn36.6:3.17: Adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, visaññutto naṁ vedayati.
sn36.6:3.18: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘sutavā ariyasāvako visaññutto jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, visaññutto dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
sn36.6:3.19: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, viseso, ayaṁ adhippayāso, idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanenāti.
